title: Crime Alert 04.20.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.20.21
description:
Good Samaritan buys a guy a meal. He steals her car and runs over her. Banking error deposits a million dollars into an account, The account holder won't give it back. Arrested for spending it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
